title: Heartseeker Fiora Concept (art!)
body:
Hey everybody! Hope the new year is treating you well so far. I've had this in my brain for a while and finally got around to drawing it out! All I have at the moment is a pretty rough topdown concept and flat colored turnarounds for modeling purposes, but I'd like to make a fully rendered front concept eventually! I think Fiora could really take the "Queen of Hearts", Wonderlandesque themes introduced with Heartseeker Ashe and run with them. I think the aesthetic suits her character really well. Hopefully the images actually embed wish me luck

https://38.media.tumblr.com/8b72312274d8eb498b084da8ae88c6c6/tumblr_nhq7vzhHiJ1tz0f3qo1_1280.png
https://31.media.tumblr.com/ba143b56fde3ef9a10b65092454c6cea/tumblr_nhq7vzhHiJ1tz0f3qo2_1280.png
https://38.media.tumblr.com/66d21fdd1a29b6155ba2dbdb89107b12/tumblr_nhq7vzhHiJ1tz0f3qo3_1280.png

I'm trying to stick thematically with what was introduced with Heartseeker Ashe, but I wanted to introduce some Cupid elements to the design as well. I thought it'd be cool for her cape to resemble a feathered wing, but it could just as easily be changed to a more fancy, royal purple design. I think Fiora's main-gauche is an awesome opportunity for skins that hasn't really been utilized yet, especially because she doesn't actually use it in her skill animations. I like the idea of it being a bouquet of roses that she can make use of in her recall animation! In my head right now she tosses it into the air before slicing it in half and standing in the rain of petals afterwards. Hope you guys like it!
